articles.description: BALTIMORE—Mike Baumann came in for the 10th inning, hoping he could pick up his 10th win without a loss. Brandon Belt immediately hit a two-run home run, and Baumann had his first loss. The Orioles produced little offense after the fifth inning in their 6-3 l…
